edu.kings.cs233.fractal

Class Fractory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kings.cs233.fractal.Fractory

  • public class Fractory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls the generation of fractal images by displaying a menu and prompting the user for the necessary arguments for a specific fractal set.
    Version:
    2016-02-11
    Author:
    Kathryn Lavelle
